Ragnar: Neg. I rarely challenge an ally unless they sully my honor. 
From where I come, though, I am an elite warrior and this mech I have 
become is one of the fiercest ever built. I can take two Predacons at 
once.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Empath::
> 
> "He's right, Ragnar."  Empath points out.  "If you want to talk 
> credentials, I can give you an earful.  And if you were thinking of 
> challenging me to one of your silly trials on that point, I promise 
> you'll be dead before you can land a hit on me."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >        He eyes Empath cautiously, sizing her up as soon as she 
> enters the 
> > room.  He glances at Ragnar.  "She knows of what she speaks.  You 
> would be 
> > wise to listen."  He stands up and walks out into the hall casting 
> a wary 
> > glance at Empath as he passes her.  He slowly makes his way toward 
> the bridge 
> > hoping to find something to do.
